name: Ants Can't Swim
description:
Hi, this is mine and 4 others first attempt at making a game for a game jam, and for most of us our first game at all. We hope you enjoy what we made, as we put a lot of effort into it and definitely all learned a lot along the way.

The contributors for this project were:

* Myself (prchristie)

* Aquila028

* AgentKnipe

* InterstellarLowWays

* jezjez321

Ants Can't Swim is a game that emphasizes the theme "Stronger Together" by showing that a single ant on it's own can't achieve much, but when they work together they can overcome any obstacle. 

You play as a lone ant finding some friends to help along the way who give special maneuvers that would be impossible for a single ant alone. Together, you will reach the food and be filled with determination.

Expect many many MANY bugs, graphical errors and problems all throughout. Do not fret because these are features, the only bugs here are the ants.
